traits.Rotting Presence: When any creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet one or more bulezaus, that creature must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 necrotic damage plus 1 necrotic damage for each bulezau within 30 feet of it.
traits.Standing Leap: The bulezau's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
traits.Sure-Footed: The bulezau has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
